languages.text: "О нем мне известно мало. Брат мой подозревал, что память его — а также всех, кто мог знать подробности — была намеренно искажена. Брат верил, что это — знак того, что в путешествии этом была открыта великая истина, и были те, кто не желал явить ее свету".

"My knowledge of it is scarce. My brother suspected that his memory, along with the memory of all who might have known the details, had been purposefully modified. He saw it as a sign that the journey had revealed a great truth — and there were those who did not wish to see that truth brought to light."
languages.original_text: "О нем мне известно мало. Брат мой подозревал, что память его — а также всех, кто мог знать подробности — была намеренно искажена. Брат верил, что это — знак того, что в путешествии этом была открыта великая истина, и были те, кто не желал явить ее свету".

He saw it as a sign that the journey had revealed a great truth — and there were those who did not wish so see that truth brought to light."

languages.text: 「それについてはあまりよく知らない。兄弟は詳しいことを知ってるであろう全ての人物の記憶と共に、彼の記憶も意図的に改竄されたのだと疑っていた。それまでの旅が偉大な真実を解き明かしたことの証だと考えた。そして、その真実が白日の下に晒されるのを良しとしない者もいた」
languages.original_text: "My knowledge of it is scarce. My brother suspected that his memory, along with the memory of all who might have known the details, had been purposefully modified. He saw it as a sign that the journey had revealed a great truth — and there were those who did not wish to see that truth brought to light."

traits.locale_text: 「それについてはあまりよく知らない。兄弟は詳しいことを知ってるであろう全ての人物の記憶と共に、彼の記憶も意図的に改竄されたのだと疑っていた。それまでの旅が偉大な真実を解き明かしたことの証だと考えた。そして、その真実が白日の下に晒されるのを良しとしない者もいた」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “我对这件事所知甚少。我的兄弟怀疑，他和其他可能知晓细节的人，记忆都遭到了篡改。他认为，这种迹象表明那场旅行揭示了某个伟大的真理，但有些人不希望看到这个真理公之于众。”
languages.original_text: "My knowledge of it is scarce. My brother suspected that his memory, along with the memory of all who might have known the details, had been purposefully modified. He saw it as a sign that the journey had revealed a great truth — and there were those who did not wish to see that truth brought to light."

traits.locale_text: “我对这件事所知甚少。我的兄弟怀疑，他和其他可能知晓细节的人，记忆都遭到了篡改。他认为，这种迹象表明那场旅行揭示了某个伟大的真理，但有些不希望看到这个真理公之于众。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Ich weiß nur wenig darüber. Mein Bruder hatte den Verdacht, dass sein Gedächtnis bewusst modifiziert wurde — und auch das Gedächtnis aller, welche die Details vielleicht einmal gekannt haben. Er sah das als Zeichen, dass die Reise eine große Wahrheit offenbart hatte. Und dass jemand nicht wollte, dass diese Wahrheit ans Licht kommt."
languages.original_text: "My knowledge of it is scarce. My brother suspected that his memory, along with the memory of all who might have known the details, had been purposefully modified. He saw it as a sign that the journey had revealed a great truth — and there were those who did not wish to see that truth brought to light."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nur wenig darüber. Mein Bruder hatte den Verdacht, dass sein Gedächtnis bewusst modifiziert wurde — und auch das Gedächtnis aller, welche die Details vielleicht einmal gekannt haben. Er sah das als Zeichen, dass die Reise eine große Wahrheit offenbart hatte. Und dass jemand nicht wollte, dass diese Wahrheit ans Licht kommt."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Je n'en sais que peu de choses. Mon frère soupçonnait que sa mémoire, ainsi que celle de tous ceux qui auraient pu connaître les faits, avait été délibérément modifiée. Il y voyait le signe que le voyage avait révélé une grande vérité et que certains ne souhaitaient pas que cette vérité éclate au grand jour. »
languages.original_text: "My knowledge of it is scarce. My brother suspected that his memory, along with the memory of all who might have known the details, had been purposefully modified. He saw it as a sign that the journey had revealed a great truth — and there were those who did not wish to see that truth brought to light."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en sais que peu de choses. Mon frère soupçonnait que sa mémoire, ainsi que celle de tous ceux qui auraient pu connaître les faits, avait été délibérément modifiée. Il y voyait le signe que le voyage avait révélé une grande vérité et que certains ne souhaitaient pas que cette vérité éclate au grand jour. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Mis conocimientos de su viaje son escasos. Mi hermano sospechaba que su memoria, junto con los recuerdos de todos los que conocían los detalles, habían sido modificados deliberadamente. Él lo consideró un indicio de que el viaje había revelado una gran verdad y alguien no deseaba que esa verdad viese la luz».
languages.original_text: "My knowledge of it is scarce. My brother suspected that his memory, along with the memory of all who might have known the details, had been purposefully modified. He saw it as a sign that the journey had revealed a great truth — and there were those who did not wish to see that truth brought to light."

traits.locale_text: «Mis conocimientos de su viaje son escasos. Mi hermano sospechaba que su memoria, junto con los recuerdos de todos los que conocían los detalles, habían sido modificados deliberadamente. Él lo consideró un indicio de que el viaje había revelado una gran verdad y alguien no deseaba que esa verdad viese la luz».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Bu konudaki bilgilerim sınırlı. Kardeşim, kendi hafızasının yanı sıra detayları bilen herkesin hafızasının da kasıtlı olarak değiştirildiğinden şüpheleniyordu. Bunu, bu yolculuğun büyük bir hakikati ortaya çıkardığına dair bir işaret olarak yorumladı. Ayrıca bu hakikatin gün yüzü görmesini istemeyenler olduğuna kanaat getirmişti."
languages.original_text: "My knowledge of it is scarce. My brother suspected that his memory, along with the memory of all who might have known the details, had been purposefully modified. He saw it as a sign that the journey had revealed a great truth — and there were those who did not wish to see that truth brought to light."

traits.locale_text: "Bu konudaki bilgilerim sınırlı. Kardeşim, kendi hafızasının yanı sıra detayları bilen herkesin hafızasının da kasıtlı biçimde değiştirildiğinden şüpheleniyordu. Bunu, bu yolculuğun büyük bir hakikati ortaya çıkardığına dair bir işaret olarak yorumladı. Ayrıca bu hakikatin gün yüzü görmesini istemeyenler olduğuna kanaat getirmişti."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
